alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 845 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of North County Airport to near The Acreage. Movement was north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Royal Palm Beach, North County Airport, The Acreage, Loxahatchee Groves, Philo Farms, Limestone Creek, Caloosa, Jupiter Farms, Cypress Lakes and Century Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
